typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		prl_type_code_desc as string,
		prl_ri_vessel_type as string,
		paris_ipapcode as string,
		prl_text as string,
		prl_main_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		prl_period_from as date,
		prl_reason as string,
		prl_sub_limit_ind as string,
		prl_period_to as date,
		prl_premium_days as short,
		prl_pro_rata_ind as string,
		prl_add_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		prl_premium_basis as decimal(28,10),
		prl_type_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select prl_period_to,	\nprl_premium_basis,\nprl_text,\nprl_sub_limit_ind,\nprl_pro_rata_ind,\npk_key,\nprl_type_code_desc,\nprl_period_from,\nprl_reason,\nprl_type_code,\nprl_ri_vessel_type,	\nprl_add_cover_limit_usd,	\nprl_main_cover_limit_usd,	\nparis_ipapcode,\nprl_premium_days\nfrom dwh_prepare.pre_dim_premium_line',
	format: 'query') ~> PreDimPremiumLine
PreDimPremiumLine aggregate(groupBy(pk_key),
	each(match(name!='pk_key'), $$ = max($$))) ~> GetDistinctRows
GetDistinctRows select(mapColumn(
		prl_key = pk_key,
		prl_type_code_desc,
		prl_ri_vessel_type,
		prl_paris_ipacode = paris_ipapcode,
		prl_text,
		prl_main_cover_limit_usd,
		prl_period_from,
		prl_reason,
		prl_sub_limit_ind,
		prl_period_to,
		prl_premium_days,
		prl_pro_rata_ind,
		prl_add_cover_limit_usd,
		prl_premium_basis,
		prl_type_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelAndRenameCols
SelAndRenameCols derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Premium Lines') ~> AddTopLvlCols
AddTopLvlCols alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		prl_period_to as date,
		prl_premium_basis as decimal(28,10),
		prl_text as string,
		top_key as string,
		prl_sub_limit_ind as string,
		prl_pro_rata_ind as string,
		prl_key as string,
		prl_type_code_desc as string,
		prl_period_from as date,
		prl_reason as string,
		prl_type_code as string,
		prl_ri_vessel_type as string,
		prl_add_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		prl_main_cover_limit_usd as decimal(28,10),
		prl_paris_ipacode as string,
		prl_premium_days as decimal(28,10),
		top_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['prl_key'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimPremiumLine
